title: Sentinels, On Sla2ers, Team Vitality - News Almost Missed June 24
description: VLR.gg's weekly recap series, News Almost Missed, returns once again to bring you stories from around the world that you might have not seen.
author: Hudsen

title: FunPlus Phoenix rounds out EMEA grand final
description: ANGE1 and co. made quick work of Guild and pushed on to the grand final to rematch FNATIC tomorrow.
author: DazzleAlec

title: OpTic claim first NA seat at Copenhagen
description: NRG have bowed out of Stage 2 Challengers, and OpTic have punched their ticket back to the international stage.
author: Hudsen

title: FunPlus Phoenix secure final Copenhagen slot in EMEA
description: Despite being knocked down to the lower bracket, FPX have persevered and have secured another Masters slot.
author: Eutalyx

title: Masters: Copenhagen to feature live crowd
description: It will be Valorant's first international event with a live audience.
author: Hudsen

title: Gamelanders bench male roster
description: Gamelanders have benched their entire male roster

title: Four remain after one week of NA playoffs
description: Four teams are left to compete for two slots at Copenhagen
author: FerahgoTheGreat

title: FPX and M3C survive lower bracket scraps in EMEA playoffs
description: In a star-studded lower bracket, only two teams advanced to stay in with a shot at the final Masters Copenhagen slot.

title: Guild and Fnatic secure first EMEA Copenhagen slots
description: Fnatic are going back to Masters. Guild are finally attending a LAN.
